pullrequest.title: Prevent GUI from jumping around, pixel saving, analysis submission improvements

content.raw:
I just tried turning off BIAS during a shot, to make its BLACS tab crash on transition to manual, and rather than getting an error message in the queue, I got a popup:

![error transition to manual.PNG](data/bitbucket.org/repo/dR5qxr/images/3078800611-error_transition_to_manual.PNG)
